WOMEN SEAMLESS DOWN JACKET

Additional Information

Product Detail

Materials

This down coat has a seamless design to shut out wind, rain, and snow.

  • A lack of exterior stitching prevents wind and water from getting in.
  • Hood with high collar covers and protects the face and neck.
  • Faux fur trimmed hood provides excellent protection from the cold.
  • Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: Down (Minimum 90% Down) Lining: 100% Polyester/ Rib: 74% Acrylic, 23% Polyester, 3% Spandex/ Fake Fur: 78% Modacrylic, 12% Polyester, 10% Acrylic
  • Hand wash cold
  • Imported
you may also like
WOMEN SEAMLESS DOWN JACKET is rated 4.4 out of 5 by 26.
Rated 5 out of 5 by Pisces from 10F degrees and I'm sweating! This is one of the warmest jackets I've ever had! Living in a city where you're forced to walk around outside, I found this jacket to offer great protection from the elements in sub-freezing weather. The ribbing at the end of the sleeves help keep the out cold air and the hood provide a nice cover. Another feature I like is the zippered side pockets. I found the jacket true to size.
Date published: 2018-01-15
Rated 5 out of 5 by Li from Perfec My daughter is very happy with this jaket.it is warm and not heavy.
Date published: 2018-01-11
Rated 5 out of 5 by Joleyn from Great Buy! Bought this for my daughter who is extremely happy. Keeps her very warm. I hope it’s warm enough for Edinburgh
Date published: 2018-01-06
Rated 5 out of 5 by Aira from Great product I bought this product a couple weeks ago. My size should be S but it was out of stock, because i didn't want to wait too long for the next availability, I decided to purchase size M. Though it is a bit longer for the sleeves i dont mind it. It's not too bulky either, so I don't regret to spend my money for this product.
Date published: 2017-12-27
